title: Co-Founder
bio: As a founding partner at Konabos, Akshay Sura leads the development of cutting-edge web applications using Composable and Sitecore technologies. He specializes in building robust, compliant web infrastructures that deliver seamless digital experiences. Akshay drives scalable solutions that support digital innovation, including emerging AI-driven and vibe coding approaches, and he and his team have earned multiple Sitecore MVP recognitions.
